page.title: 14SHOPPING
page.content: Shanklin is one of the larger shopping centres on the Island. There are a variety of shops in the two main streets ,Regent Street and High Street. Inevitably in a holiday town,there are lots of souvenier shops to cater for The tourists, but the residents are also well provided for with clothes and food shops ,newesagents d.i.y. sport,shops and a Co-op department store.Scattered beteen the other shops are several estate agent,building societys office and snack bars on the site of the bus station a new Gateway supestore is nearly complete.A lot of local residents also shop out of the area at the Tesco superstore near Ryde.
